title: cmd/gc: ./size_256.go:2618: internal compiler error: regfree: reg not allocated
body:
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?

this issue is for a large program, above a threshold size: see attached size_255.go for
a program right below the threshold that compiles and runs ok, see attached size_256.go
for a program right above the threshold that doesn't. 

2. What is the full compiler output?

mra@dxfce:~/ad$ go run size_256.go 
# command-line-arguments
./size_256.go:2618: internal compiler error: regfree: reg not allocated

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)

go version devel +d7d71f7d6f53 Thu Nov 20 09:35:22 2014 -0800 linux/amd64
Attachments: 1. size_255.go (147379 bytes) 1. size_256.go (147950 bytes)
